headline: Honeywell International Inc. (HON): “The Breakup Is Extraordinarily Good,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 9 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is a mega American industrial conglomerate that is due for a breakup. Its shares have lost 6.8% year-to-date, and Cramer has remained upbeat about the split-up in 2025. In […]
